Energy flashes come from the shields as the Destrucons attack, the base sha=
kes alerting Ignatius of trouble. Ignatius set all external defenses on ful=
l power, laser cannons rise out of the dunes taking aim fireing about a doz=
en shots at Ramjet and Dirge.

The stasis mines detect energy signatures ne=
arby and turn toward Skywarp attempting to follow his energy trail.

.com

rive!


  :::The Destrocons::: 

  ::As they near the Trainer base, the Des=
trocons see the beams of energy 
  coming toward them:: 
  Ramjet: Careful =
guys! 
  Skywarp: Im always careful. 
  Dirge: Suuuuuuure-AHHHH 
  ::An ene=
rgy beam narrowly misses him:: 
  Dirge: I'll be quiet now. 
  ::They conti=
nue to maneuver around the energy beams, and while maneuvering, 
  their gu=
ns flip out:: 
  Ramjet: Alright, you remember what Cygnar said! Give 'em t=
he pit!

ase::
